text: Antun Marković (; born 4 July 1992) is a Croatian footballer who currently plays as a goalkeeper in Kazakhstan for FC Atyrau. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1992 births Category:People from Gjilan Category:Living people Category:Croatian footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:NK Slaven Belupo players Category:FC Atyrau players Category:Croatian First Football League players Category:Kazakhstan Premier League players Category:Croatian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Kazakhstan
title: Antun Marković
